name: Divas on Ice
description:
Meet the coolest Divas on Nintendo Wii. The first in a brand new series of games designed for young girls, Divas on Ice introduces you to Kelly, Gabrielle, Alyssa, and Madison, four young girls skating for glory in the Miracle Ice Festival. Dress your favorite skater in thousands of combinations of customizable outfits, then train hard to upgrade your skating skills so you can wow the crowd, impress the judges and be crowned the Ultimate Diva on Ice.

Features

• Customizable characters with huge selection of outfits, accessories, and equipment
• Challenging activities that enable you build your skater's skills at each level
• Fun Wii controls that put you into the action, right from the start
